tool_description: Calculates shipping rates for specified package and route using carrier-specific rate tables and service options.

package_dimensions.description: Package dimensions as 'length x width x height' in inches

error_messages: Invalid carrier configuration: Carrier ID not found or inactive
Unsupported service type: Service type not available for this carrier
Invalid package specifications: Weight or dimensions outside carrier limits
Invalid shipping zone: Zone not recognized for this carrier
Rate calculation failed: Unable to calculate rate with provided parameters
Service restrictions: Requested options not available for this service type
usage: Provide carrier_id, service_type, package specifications, and shipping_zone. Optionally add declared_value and service options. Returns calculated shipping rate.

total_cost.description: Total shipping cost including all fees
